LanguageData.Animal_Flu.label: gripe
LanguageData.Animal_Flu.description: An infectious disease caused by the influenza virus. This strain is adapted for infecting non-human species.
LanguageData.Animal_Flu.stages.minor.label: leve
LanguageData.Animal_Flu.stages.major.label: grave
LanguageData.Animal_Flu.stages.extreme.label: extrema
LanguageData.Animal_Plague.label: peste
LanguageData.Animal_Plague.description: An infectious disease caused by bacteria. This strain is adapted to infecting non-human species.
LanguageData.Animal_Plague.stages.minor.label: fase inicial
LanguageData.Animal_Plague.stages.major.label: moderada
LanguageData.Animal_Plague.stages.extreme-0.label: grave
LanguageData.Animal_Plague.stages.extreme-1.label: severa
LanguageData.FibrousMechanites.label: mecanitas fibrosos
LanguageData.FibrousMechanites.description: Semi-coherent mechanites which develop fibrous links in muscle tissue. They enhance the victim's strength, but also cause intense pain. These are probably a mutated strain of strength-enhancing mechanites.
LanguageData.FibrousMechanites.stages.mild_pain.label: dolor leve
LanguageData.Flu.label: gripe
LanguageData.Flu.description: An infectious disease caused by the influenza virus.
LanguageData.Flu.stages.minor.label: leve
LanguageData.Flu.stages.major.label: grave
LanguageData.Flu.stages.extreme.label: extrema
LanguageData.GutWorms.label: lombrices intestinales
LanguageData.GutWorms.description: Parasitic worms in the gut. They cause vomiting. They also consume the victim's food, which increases hunger.
LanguageData.Malaria.label: malaria
LanguageData.Malaria.description: An infectious disease caused by a mosquito-borne parasite.
LanguageData.Malaria.stages.minor.label: ligera
LanguageData.Malaria.stages.major.label: grave
LanguageData.Malaria.stages.extreme.label: extrema
LanguageData.MuscleParasites.label: parásitos musculares
LanguageData.MuscleParasites.description: Parasitic creatures in the muscles. These cause weakness and a lack of coordination.
LanguageData.MuscleParasites.stages.0.label: leicht
LanguageData.Plague.label: peste
LanguageData.Plague.description: An infectious disease caused by bacteria.
LanguageData.Plague.stages.minor.label: fase inicial
LanguageData.Plague.stages.major.label: moderada
LanguageData.Plague.stages.extreme-0.label: grave
LanguageData.Plague.stages.extreme-1.label: severa
LanguageData.SensoryMechanites.label: mecanitas sensoriales
LanguageData.SensoryMechanites.description: Semi-coherent mechanites which reside in the nervous system. They enhance the victim's senses, but also cause intense pain. These are probably a mutated strain of sense-enhancing mechanites.
LanguageData.SensoryMechanites.stages.mild_pain.label: dolor leve
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.label: enfermedad del sueño
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.description: An infectious disease caused by an insect-borne parasite. Sleeping sickness is not as deadly as some other diseases, but progresses slowly. The body takes a long time to clear the infection.
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.stages.minor-0.label: fase inicial
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.stages.minor-1.label: ligera
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.stages.major.label: grave
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.stages.extreme-0.label: muy grave
LanguageData.SleepingSickness.stages.extreme-1.label: extrema
LanguageData.WoundInfection.label: infección
LanguageData.WoundInfection.description: Bacterial infection in a wound. Without treatment, the bacteria will multiply, killing local tissue, and eventually causing blood poisoning and death.\n\nThrough aeons of human warfare, infections have often taken more lives than the wounds themselves.
LanguageData.WoundInfection.stages.minor.label: leve
LanguageData.WoundInfection.stages.major.label: moderada
LanguageData.WoundInfection.stages.extreme-0.label: grave
LanguageData.WoundInfection.stages.extreme-1.label: extrema
